description: Expected ingestion outcomes for regression detection (measured from fresh ingestion)

persona.notes: Lexicon + CDA directives. 386 edges from keyword matching (confidence >= 0.75). 26 orphan concepts not referenced by any directive.

experience.notes: Edges from semantic token extraction. Low density (0.875 edges/doc) suggests limited lexicon matches. 80 orphan documents (62.5%) need better connectivity.

tolerance.description: Allowed variance: 2% for nodes/vectors, 10% for edges (edges are more variable)
